content.prompt: The artist’s statement that the kings of France, Spain, and the Holy Roman Empire “stand united” most clearly suggests that

choices.label: he hoped the Peace of Westphalia would bring the rival Catholic powers back together
he wanted dynastic conflicts between the Habsburgs and rival royal houses to resume
he saw all of the major European powers as collapsing under the strain of the conflict
he thought rulers of Europe needed to stand together against the expanding Ottoman Empire

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
